The fabric display could be made into a shirt for people that struggle or are in danger of heart attacks. Maybe there could be a button you can press and the shirt shows a screen that tells people what the heartrate is.

It could be used in the kitchen to display recipes on a kitchen towel. That way they would be there for you whenever you needed them and you wouldn't have to worry about them not being their when you needed to make something.

You could use them do display movies in places where tv just wasn't there. You could select what you wanted to see and it would show it for you. It would have a good selection it could be streaming so there isn't any memory.

DESCRIPTION: It could be used as a device that is easy to keep with you and could help you with your day to day stuff. If you forgot something it could remind you. or if you needed help or directions it could be used so you could get advice you need.

It could be used as a covering for a sofa. It could change patterns and it would create patterns however you wanted. It could suggest patterns and if you liked them you could select that. If not you would just tell it the pattern you wanted.

You could use it as a table cloth. When you eat dinner you could play games on it. Learn new things. Watch discussions on subjects. That way dinner would be funner. When it got dirty you could just clean it because it's made of fabric and easy to clean.

You could just have a cloth you could put on your closet door. That way for those who like to stay organized could keep there wardrobe organized and know what they are going to wear for the day or week and it would be convenient because it's not in the way.
+ACI-The kind of thing that can do this
